section.54: The Book of Tribulations and Portents of the Last Hour

hadiths.text: Abu Huraira reported Allah's Apostle (ï·º) as saying:There would be turmoil and the one who would sleep would be better than who would be awake and the one who would be awake would be better than one who would stand and one who would stand would be better than one who would run. So he who finds refuge or shelter should take that refuge or shelter
